summary: A Massive overhaul for Vlindrel Hall located in Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
Here's my Beta release.

NOTE: Video is from before the official release so it doesn't have the terrace etc.
[youtube]6tpH0g73xt4[/youtube]

This mod Overhauls the player home available for purchase in Markarth

[b][u]Features[/u]:[/b]

- Completely Remodeled ( I'm talking 90% here as the layout is still pretty much the same except the crafting area and the old alchemy area)

[b]*New* [/b]Vlindrel Hall:

- Alchemy lab
- Dining Room
- Spare Room
- Enchanting / Display Room
- Master Bedroom
- Main Room
- Entryway

- [b]Custom Crafting Area:[/b]

- [b]Terrace \ chill spot[/b] 

- [b]TONS of storage space, and I mean TONS.[/b]

More Features to come eventually.

[b]Requires Dragonborn and Dawnguard DLCS[/b]

[u][b]Compatibility Issues[/b][/u]

There shouldn't be any unless you have a mod that modifies Markarth or Vlindrel Hall. (or if you dont own Dawnguard and Dragonborn. [b]([u]YES YOU NEED BOTH DLCS[/u])[/b]

Texture mods are fully supported!

[u][b]Possible Bugs[/b][/u]

The house decorations you can buy, still work. However if your trying to add an alchemy lab, enchanting table and / or a room for your children, nothing will happen and you'll probably just lose gold.
 Just stick to the decorations and not the crafting / kid's room and you'll be fine!

With that being said about the kid's room. its pretty obvious that this house wont support a kid's room ( This is temporary hopefully, as this mod is still in the [b]Beta[/b] stages )

Hope you guys enjoy my mod!

Frost
author: DJFrosted
